{:10_492:}10_492:}[attach]460489[/attach]一开就这样

@echo OFF
SET BINDIR=%~dp0
"C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx10G -jar "%BINDIR%\mcpc-plus-1.7.2-R0.3-forge1025-B38.jar
PAUSE

没写错啊

这是怎么回事


求大神啊

不知道发错了沒

wwpzxp 发表于 2014-2-11 12:33
对啊，你那是服务端，我说看看启动器的最佳内存设置是多少
@echo OFF
:restart
echo run server now ,  you can't close
java -Xmx14336M -Xms1024M -XX:PermSize=64M -XX:MaxPermSize=256M -jar mcpc-plus-1.7.2-R0.3-forge1025-B38.jar
echo Restart after 5 seconds , you can close now
ping -n 2 -w 500 0.0.0.1>nul
echo Restart after 4 seconds , you can close now
ping -n 2 -w 500 0.0.0.1>nul
echo Restart after 3 seconds , you can close now
ping -n 2 -w 500 0.0.0.1>nul
echo Restart after 2 seconds , you can close now
ping -n 2 -w 500 0.0.0.1>nul
echo Restart after 1 seconds , you can close now
ping -n 2 -w 500 0.0.0.1>nul
goto restart

这也起动不了

replies.author: wwpzxp
replies.txt_content:
zx199728 发表于 2014-2-11 12:34
@echo OFF
:restart
echo run server now ,  you can't close
登录你的游戏，启动器，然后点设置，看看最佳内存是多少，然后让服务端和你的启动器的最佳内存一样。
